SELECT TBL.* ,(SELECT NAME FROM TB_CATEGORY_INFO WHERE ISUSE = 'Y' AND CODE = TBL.CATEGORY_CD) CATEGORY_NM ,(SELECT NAME FROM TB_LEARNING_FORM_INFO WHERE ISUSE = 'Y' AND CODE = TBL.LEARNING_CD) LEARNING_NM ,(SELECT COUNT(RSC_ID) FROM TB_CA_BOOK WHERE SEQ = TBL.SEQ AND RSC_ID NOT IN (TBL.RSC_ID)) RELCNT FROM ( SELECT T2.SEQ, T2.RSC_ID , T2.BOOK_NM, T2.BOOK_AUTHOR, T2.BOOK_PUBLISHERS , CASE T2.COVER_TYPE WHEN 'A' THEN '주문가능' WHEN 'S' THEN '품절' WHEN 'O' THEN '절판' WHEN 'N' THEN '신규' ELSE '' END AS COVER_TYPE , T2.BOOK_STOCK , T2.CATEGORY_CD, T2.LEARNING_CD , T2.REG_DT , (SELECT AVG(C.CHOICE_POINT) FROM TB_COMMENT_BOOK C WHERE C.RSC_ID= T2.RSC_ID) CHOICE_POINT FROM (SELECT SEQ, MIN(RSC_ID) RSC_ID FROM TB_CA_BOOK GROUP BY SEQ) T1 INNER JOIN TB_CA_BOOK T2 ON T1.RSC_ID = T2.RSC_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND T2.CATEGORY_CD = #{SEARCHKIND}
AND T2.BOOK_AUTHOR like CONCAT('%',#{SEARCHTEXT},'%')
AND T2.RSC_ID like CONCAT('%',#{SEARCHTEXT},'%')
AND T2.BOOK_NM like CONCAT('%',#{SEARCHTEXT},'%')
AND ( T2.BOOK_AUTHOR like CONCAT('%',#{SEARCHTEXT},'%') OR T2.RSC_ID like CONCAT('%',#{SEARCHTEXT},'%') OR T2.BOOK_NM like CONCAT('%',#{SEARCHTEXT},'%') )
ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(T2.REG_DT,'%Y%m%d') DESC, T2.CATEGORY_CD ) TBL LIMIT #{startNo}, #{endNo}

SELECT COUNT(T1.SEQ) FROM (SELECT SEQ, MAX(RSC_ID) RSC_ID FROM TB_CA_BOOK GROUP BY SEQ) T1 INNER JOIN TB_CA_BOOK T2 ON T1.RSC_ID = T2.RSC_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND T2.CATEGORY_CD = #{SEARCHKIND}
AND T2.BOOK_AUTHOR like '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%'
AND T2.RSC_ID like '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%'
AND T2.BOOK_NM like '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%'
AND ( T2.BOOK_AUTHOR like '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%' OR T2.RSC_ID like '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%' OR T2.BOOK_NM like '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%' )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT C.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM ( SELECT RSC_ID , SEQ , USER_ID, USER_NAME , CONTENT , CHOICE_POINT , TO_CHAR(REG_DT , 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') REG_DT FROM TB_COMMENT_BOOK WHERE RSC_ID = #{RSC_ID} ORDER BY SEQ DESC ) C WHERE rownum <= #{endNo} ) WHERE rnum > #{startNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM TB_COMMENT_BOOK WHERE RSC_ID = #{RSC_ID} ORDER BY SEQ DESC
